website_summaries.verdict: This waist-high standing scoreboard converts to a tabletop unit, giving you display options, depending up on the sport.
pros: Converts from a 38" standing unit to 12" tabletop scoreboard
Score cards accommodate points from 0 to 99
PVC stand features cross-style base for stability
Two dry-erase panels allow coaches, referees and scorekeepers to mark the team names
cons: No way to display innings or periods

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friend who plays cornhole and was looking for a scoreboard. WE both was very impressed. Taller and more visible than what I thought. Very easy to assemble. From some of the reviews people complained about the numbers you turn over not being straight or durable. Don't let that discourage you from buying. It's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Holimon

customer_reviews.title: Great scorekeeper not so great for ping pong
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice however I wished it was digital as it takes time for me to have to keep each score being that I use it for ping pong. It's very durable it's a great product but for what I needed it wasn't what I expected. The product is great it was my fault for purchasing something that I wished was different.
customer_reviews.author: JODI BURTON

customer_reviews.title: Best Manual Scorekeeper I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect for my game show score board. Light weight and extremely portable! Better than electronic because there is less to go wrong and much more economical! It is well made for the price. I love it! I love the fact that I can adjust it and if I need it higher, it is sturdy enough to set the whole thing on a small table for larger audiences to see. The only issue that some may have is that it is not the color of the one in the picture. This is much better for me as mine came in red and black. Some may have an issue with this so I recommend that the picture be updated.
customer_reviews.author: Nancilee Jones

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to assemble and disassemble. Haven’t used on a windy day yet so don't know if it stays upright in windy conditions. Only complaint is that there isn’t anything like a rubber band to help hold the numbers once you flip them.
customer_reviews.author: Ray-Ray

customer_reviews.title: It works, so what's not to like
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our bi-weekly basketball group. Out of all the options, this was cheap and we have been using it for over a year now. Its a cheap piece of cr...p, but it works! We removed the "home" and "guest" part a long time ago. They are made of cheap cardboard, junky. It falls apart when I carry it as well. Its made of PVC pipe but is durable. Like I said, the guys use this twice a week and it does what its supposed to do. So I would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scoreboard for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this scoreboard for cornhole and ping pong. This scoreboard is really sturdy and very good quality. The actual numbers are very good quality and dont feel cheaply made. It is very light which makes transportation easy. I live in Colorado and the wind can be problem here. This unit is pretty lightweight so I usually put a few big rocks on the base and have no issues. I can see this unit lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Pimperville2

customer_reviews.title: Good score keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Thus score keeper is great! Easy to assemble and very light to carry on.. The only thing is missing would be some hooks or something to keep it solid to the ground, because is so light it tents to till over easily with light winds!!! Price is also somewhat in the high end, should be no more tan $25.00 bug I paid over $40.00 :(
customer_reviews.author: AlexCTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: This was great for our rec volleyball league
customer_reviews.text: This was great for our rec volleyball league! Highly recommend....yes you could easily make one of your own...but this looks nice and held up well to a season of use.
customer_reviews.author: Shell 1972

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item for children and grownups
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw this I thought it must be highly over priced. I am here to tell you it is not. It is extremly well made and durable. We bought it for a childs birthday and it was a hit!!! He grabbed it as fast as he could get it out and ran downstairs with it. We had to force him back to open the rest of his presents. I highly recommend it for score keeping.
customer_reviews.author: SHELLYD

customer_reviews.title: Score solution!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it!! Easy to use! Backyard games, scrimmages, pick up games at the park!! It’s great! We use it for basketball and ping pong
customer_reviews.author: S Marie Looney

customer_reviews.title: its not as shown
customer_reviews.text: The photo of this scoreboard was blue and yellow. it was very disappointing that what was sent to me was red and white. it did not go with what we had bought. just not happen with what we got
customer_reviews.author: matthew gervia

customer_reviews.title: Great,sturdy scoreboard for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs, this breaks down into 3 pieces for easy storage. The material for the numbers is a nice thick vinyl. We play in a gym so it is close enough for everyone to be able to see it. It may be a little small if you have spectators spread out. If you need a nice, durable scoreboard- look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: This scoring stand worked out perfect for softball games
customer_reviews.text: This scoring stand worked out perfect for softball games. The colors are black pole, orange end caps, white/orange and orange/white numbers.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Just what you think...
customer_reviews.text: I received it in good time, and it's sturdy and strong. The plastic flaps (for the numbers) look like they'll stand the test of time and are easily visible from a distance. The places for "Home" or "Guest" are a bit disappointing - they're white-board style cardboard for you to write on. Overall, though, good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joe American

customer_reviews.title: Good for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: We needed a stand to keep score of a company incentive going on. This is about waist high and the yellow/blue combo is very bright and eye catching. It's all plastic, so I don't know how well it work outside with wind blowing. For what we needed, it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: it worked great.
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I expected it would be. We used it for an out door sand volleyball tournament. It did work well other than if the wind blows at all the numbered flags blow all over and it is hard to keep score. Other than that, it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item to keep track of score!
customer_reviews.text: I am a mobile DJ with a buzzer system for trivia and other contests. I needed a scoring system and the electronic ones were just too pricey. This is a simple system but it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: djdivine

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Not disappointed. On grass, it needs support to remain standing. Now if we can remember to flip the numbers on every point!
customer_reviews.author: Constant Listener

customer_reviews.title: Usevul for many sports
customer_reviews.text: I got this to score hockey in the winter, and soccer in the summer. The scoreboard is durable, and easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: HiTechCharles

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the price. Can be difficult when it's windy, but to be expected for the material the numbers are printed on. I have used it a couple times with no outright complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Savior-X

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, kids use for all sorts of backyard sports
customer_reviews.author: kktoy722

customer_reviews.title: We take this to beach for Volleyball. We just ...
customer_reviews.text: We take this to beach for Volleyball. We just bury the lower part in the sand an it stays put. We add large clips to hold the numbered pages to stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great and we plan to Use it for many more ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was delivered as expected. Worked out great and we plan to Use it for many more times for some intense teenage basketball game.
customer_reviews.author: Spanky

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and can be seen from the other sideline.
customer_reviews.author: RoxyDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Use it for annual wiffle ball tournament.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a long time for a good score board and this one is great. It is sturdy and not noisy as it is not plugged in and quite sturdy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: wbddd8

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great to use in a area when ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great to use in a area when you are not on grass also. Only problem is numbers flip easily in wind.
customer_reviews.author: A. McDougal

customer_reviews.title: SSG/BSN Manual Scorekeeper with Adjustable Stand
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed. Great for keeping score courtside. Much more simple than keeping score our selves. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Manual Scorekeeper
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this will help us keep score, we seem to loss track of it, more important is the enjoyment of people playing and the time spent doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Teckemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good..
customer_reviews.text: The scorekeeper was exactly what I expected as described on Amazon. Quality is very good.....all is made of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Neri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think the quality of this is good for the price. Overall I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan WItt

customer_reviews.title: Just for the family
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I expected for the price. It gets the job done. Anything more than this would have been over kill.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Jeffris

customer_reviews.title: Scoring stand is fine!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I got it fast. It would be a plus if the height were adjustable, but the product is as shown and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: My hockey playing boys love this. Perfect for wear and tear
customer_reviews.text: My young boys love this scoreboard-- great for hockey or other outside activities. Very well made-should last forever.
customer_reviews.author: A. LANAVE

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: Loved this, but they sent me completely different colors (red/white). Wish I was aware of that. But it’s perfect for my middle schoolers
customer_reviews.author: Jillian S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Need to buy sand bags with it if using outside.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

product_meta.title: Manual Scorekeeper with Adjustable Stand
product_meta.description: SSG / BSN 1162448 Manual Scorekeeper with Adjustable Stand (EA)
feature_bullets: Two scores are displayed on cards that flip over for quick score changes
Score cards accommodate points from 0 to 99
PVC stand features a 15 in. x 15 in. cross-style base for stability and converts from a 38 in. standing unit to a 12 in. tabletop scoreboard
Two dry-erase panels allow coaches, referees and scorekeepers to mark the team names
Numbers are displayed on contrast-color backgrounds in bold red or bright white for easy visibility

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
